revision.text:
==Details==
===Uses=== The farm is a place that you can plant [[Berries]] that when harvest will give you Money, and [[Farming Points]]. It can be upgraded to open more plots that allow you to plant more berries.
===Upgrades===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Plots !! Cost in [[FP]] |- | 1 to 2 || Example |- | 2 to 3 || Example |- | 3 to 4 || Example |- | 4 to 5 || Example |- | 5 to 6 || Example |- | 6 to 7 || Example |- | 7 to 8 || Example |- | 8 to 9 || Example |- | 9 to 10 || Example |- | 10 to 11 || Example |- | 11 to 12 || Example |- | 12 to 13 || Example |- | 13 to 14 || Example |- | 14 to 15 || Example |- | 15 to 16 || Example |- | 16 to 17 || Example |- | 17 to 18 || Example |- | 18 to 19 || Example |- | 19 to 20 || Example |- | 20 to 21 || Example |- | 21 to 22 || Example |- | 22 to 23 || Example |- | 23 to 24 || Example |- | 24 to 25 || Example |}
